text: Gido attin he do7azi oykettides. Kase izara daro malata oothida wordo nabeyka izara oykettides. Izi qass he do7aza malatay istta bolla dizaytane he do7aza misilezas goynidaytane gita malatata oothi oothidi istta balethishe gami7ides. Heyti nam7ati diine geetettiza taman exiza tama abban hayqqontta paxa dishe yegettida.
